title: Kog'Maw Infinite blue buff (BUG)
body:
I just had a game as Kog'maw and i had blue buff (it had almost run out) then i was killed by jayce but killed him with my passive, when i respawned i had blue buff again (full duration) and it had a second rune flying around the bottom, this happened once again, this time under my turret and either the turret or my ignite got the kill, anyway he died before my passive exploded, i still respawned with blue (full duration) this time the runes were in groups of 3 as shown in the picture, when i died next and i hadn't killed my killer i respawned without the icon of blue buff active effect in the left bottom corner but i still had the animation of blue around me, (although one set of runes had disappeared) and that effect stayed on me for the rest of the game regardless of whether i died or not, 
i have experienced this once before with red buff and sion's passive but i just assumed it was a side effect of this new non losing buffs when executed patch, but now I'm not so convinced. whether its a bug or not it seems to unfairly favour champions with an after death passive.

replies.body: Karthus can do this to, he's been able to do it for almost a year lol :p
I fed a double buff to a sion top who kept the buffs intact across 3~ of its deaths. Can't remember if it ever lost them. New buffs were up & out as well in the time. Patch4.20

What I have seen in my games with this glitch is that it is purely visual. The buff circle stays forever but doesn't give the buff effects once a death has occurred or once the timer has run out.

It was happening to a shyvana in my game

Same thing happened with one of my friends last night when he was playing Sion. I'm assuming he killed someone who had red buff while in his passive form because for the rest of the game he visually had it but it wasn't proccing/showing up with the buffs/debuffs.
